sentences.en: Abu is not his real name, but it's one he uses to disguise his identity.
sentences.cn: 阿布不是他的真名，是他用于伪装身份的名字。

sentences.en: Afflictions are sometimes blessings in disguise.
sentences.cn: 塞翁失马,焉知非福.

sentences.en: He could not disguise that he had had the worst imaginable day for any minister.
sentences.cn: 他刚刚经历了对于任何部长而言都是最糟糕的一天，这对他来说无法掩饰。

sentences.en: He escaped across the border disguised as a priest.
sentences.cn: 他装扮成神父越境逃走了。

sentences.en: He is a master of disguise.
sentences.cn: 他是伪装高手。

sentences.en: He made no attempt to disguise his agitation.
sentences.cn: 他无意掩饰他的不安。

sentences.en: He was wearing that ridiculous disguise.
sentences.cn: 他一副滑稽的装扮。

sentences.en: He went about in the disguise of a sailor.
sentences.cn: 他伪装成海员到处流窜.

sentences.en: He went among the drug dealers in disguise.
sentences.cn: 他化装混到毒品贩子当中.

sentences.en: His disguise didn’t fool anyone.
sentences.cn: 他的伪装没能骗过任何人。

sentences.en: It is impossible to disguise the fact that business is bad.
sentences.cn: 生意不好这件事无法隐瞒.

sentences.en: She disguised herself as a man, but she couldn't disguise her voice.
sentences.cn: 她假扮成男人, 但改不了声音.

sentences.en: She wore dark glasses in an absurd attempt at disguise.
sentences.cn: 她戴了副墨镜企图伪装，样子很可笑。

sentences.en: The British team did not disguise their delight at their success.
sentences.cn: 英国队毫不掩饰他们获胜的喜悦。

sentences.en: The failure to conclude the trade talks last December could prove a blessing in disguise.
sentences.cn: 去年12月份贸易谈判中止可能因祸得福。

sentences.en: The spy's disguise was soon penetrated.
sentences.cn: 间谍的伪装不久便被识破了.

sentences.en: The supposed prince was really a beggar in disguise.
sentences.cn: 那个被信以为真的王子,原来是个乔装的乞丐.

sentences.en: There’s no way you can disguise that southern accent.
sentences.cn: 你是无法掩盖那南方口音的。

sentences.en: This false beard is his disguise.
sentences.cn: 这假胡子是他的伪装用品.

sentences.en: This language serves to disguise and obscure.
sentences.cn: 这话是用来文过饰非的.

sentences.en: You'll have to travel in disguise.
sentences.cn: 你只能乔装出行。

words.tran_cn: 伪装；假装；用作伪装的东西

phrases.tran_cn: 伪装，假扮成；托辞；以……为借口

trans.tran_cn: 伪装，装扮，伪装物，化妆用具
trans.tran_en: something that you wear to change your appearance and hide who you are, or the act of wearing this
to change the appearance, sound, taste etc of something so that people do not recognize it
To disguise something means to hide it or make it appear different so that people will not know about it or will not recognize it

trans.tran_cn: 假扮，化装，伪装；掩盖，掩饰
trans.tran_en: to change someone’s appearance so that people cannot recognize them
to change someone’s appearance so that people cannot recognize them

trans.tran_cn: 掩饰； 伪装， 假装
